entry.title: Moment
entry.summary:
Author: gusgusleoncito

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,932Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 22

Summary: One night under a full moon changed everything. Now Bruce and Clark are left trying to navigate their lives with partners they love, haunted by a moment they can't forget and a need they can't satisfy. Inspired by 'Moment' by Sean Biopcik. Or, Clark and Bruce make the mistake of finally giving in to each other for one night. Now they're both in relationships with people they love, haunted by someone they need, and there's no good way out of this.

entry.title: Power
entry.summary:
Author: ope-uh-oh (shortjacketlongskirt)

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 84,872Chapters: 17/?Kudos: 190

Summary: ‚ÄúOh, you do like to flirt, don‚Äôt you?‚Äù Lex accused almost playfully, if not for the sharklike emptiness in his eyes. Bruce sat back as the appetizer plates were taken away and replaced with the entr√©e: filet mignon in a mushroom gravy, served with truffles, asparagus, and black garlic potatoes. He couldn‚Äôt help but think Clark would have appreciated this. And he desperately wished he was here with him rather than Vicki. He flashed a playful grin at Lex. ‚ÄúFlirting is what makes the world go round, Lex. What is that quote attributed to Oscar Wilde? ‚ÄòEverything in the world is about sex except sex, which is about power‚Äô. It applies to everything. Make people think you want them, and you‚Äôve got the whole world in your hands.‚Äù After years of living in the closet, trying to ignore the truth, Bruce is finally cornered and is forced to come out in a very public way. This leads to a series of challenges, blending his public and private life in way he can‚Äôt escape.

entry.summary:
Author: battinscnz

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,451Chapters: 3/21Kudos: 21

Summary: Clark Kent is fresh out of college, beginning his first job at the Daily Planet, and doing his best to blend into the city around him. It would be simple enough - learning the ropes, chasing leads, keeping his head down - if he weren‚Äôt also quietly saving people in the shadows and trying to control abilities that don‚Äôt come with a manual. Metropolis whispers about a mysterious figure streaking through the night sky. They call him the Blur. Clark never intended to become anyone‚Äôs rumor. It happened anyway. Bruce Wayne arrives in the city chasing those rumors, determined to uncover the truth behind the impossible rescues and the flashes of color across the skyline. He expects a vigilante. He expects a secret. He doesn‚Äôt expect Clark. What begins as polite conversation turns to shared rooftop nights, lingering glances, and a slow pull neither of them planned. As Bruce edges closer to discovering Clark‚Äôs truth, he finds himself facing an even harder question:Is he here to unmask the Blur or is he coming back for the young reporter who keeps ruining his certainty?

entry.title: The Man Behind the Mask
entry.summary:
Author: SpiderQ848

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,095Chapters: 5/5Kudos: 35

Summary: Technically a sequel to my previous Superbat fic though you don't really need any context from that one. Batman finally tells Superman about him being Bruce, thinking very little of it. Superman assumes Batman likes being Bruce Wayne as much as he likes being Clark Kent. Conflict ensues but they both make it out the other side having learned something new about their partners. Takes place nebulously after their respective movies once they've both become much more established, hence Bruce having more of a public facing persona than he did in The Batman.

entry.title: Lazarus walks Again
entry.summary:
Author: MaatWrites

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,102Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 21

Summary: Once there was a man that died on Halloween, but a Demon decided he would resurrect on November Second, Harry Potter's life would never be the same.
